name: damaged wood door with peephole
//: There's no need for a use-peephole, because the door is transparent
description: The bad news is that the peephole is broken and you can't use it to look through the door.  The good news is that the door is nearly broken down, so there's nothing blocking the view.  Also, the doorknob is so messed up that it can't be opened anymore.  A few planks, nails, and the right tools could patch up all the damage.

description: A standard wooden door that doesn't look very resilient.  It'd probably burn easily, too.  This one is wide open.

name: open wood door with peephole
description: A regular door made of ordinary wood, except this one has a peephole.  If you examined it more closely, you'd be able to peek through the hole.  No need right now though, since the door is open anyway.

name: closed reinforced wood door
description: Just like other wooden doors, except this one has layers of nailed-on planks and an additional hinge for reinforcement.  It might be barricaded, but it's still susceptible to fire.

name: damaged reinforced wood door
description: Despite someone's best efforts at reinforcing this door, there are splintering planks and visible holes in the wood, it could soon be smashed apart completely if not repaired.  The doorknob is all messed up and the door can't be opened until it's fixed.

name: open reinforced wood door
description: Just like other wooden doors, except this one has layers of nailed-on planks for reinforcement.  It might be fortified, but it's still susceptible to fire.  It's open, so it's not stopping anything right now.

description: A standard wooden door that doesn't look very resilient.  It'd probably burn easily, too.  This one has an extra keyhole, so it's likely locked.  You could pry it open or pick the lock.
lockpick_message: With a satisfying click, the lock on the door opens.

prying_data.failure: You pry, but can't pry open the door.

name: closed door curtain
description: Repurposed curtains from a window covering a door frame.  Could be easily taken down for supplies or placed somewhere else.

name: closed makeshift door
description: A makeshift screen consisting of planks bound together with rope, hanging vertically from the top of the doorway.  Could be easily taken down and re-purposed.

name: open door curtain
description: Repurposed curtains from a window covering a door frame.  Could be easily taken down for supplies or placed somewhere else.  The curtains are open, bundled, and tied next to the doorway.

name: closed grass curtain
description: Sheets of grass yarn covering a door frame.  Could be easily taken down for supplies or placed somewhere else.

name: open grass curtain
description: Sheets of grass yarn covering a door frame.  Could be easily taken down for supplies or placed somewhere else.  The curtains are open, bundled, and tied next to the doorway.

name: open makeshift door
description: A makeshift screen consisting of planks bound together with rope, hanging from the top of the doorway.  Could be easily taken down and re-purposed.  The planks have been rolled up and attached to the top of the doorway, allowing free movement through.

name: empty door frame
description: An empty door frame made from planks and nails.  A variety of doors could be constructed here.

name: empty door frame
description: An empty door frame made from planks and nails.  A variety of doors could be constructed here.

name: empty metal door frame
description: An empty door frame made of steel and assorted metal.  A variety of doors could be constructed here.

name: empty metal door frame
description: An empty door frame made of steel and assorted metal.  A variety of doors could be constructed here.

name: empty metal window frame
description: An empty window frame constructed from assembled metal and carefully braced with various hardware.

name: boarded up door
description: A standard wooden door that has several planks across it, nailed down to board it up and increase its durability.  It's still flammable, though.

prying.message: You pry the boards from the door.

name: boarded up damaged door
description: A boarded up wooden door, except that some of the planks are fractured or coming loose.  Without repairs, it could be broken down easily.

prying.message: You pry the boards from the door.

name: boarded up door with peephole
description: A boarded up door made of ordinary wood, except this one has a peephole.  Although it's been covered up in planks, you could still look through the peephole if you were close enough.

prying.message: You pry the boards from the door.

name: boarded up reinforced door
description: An additionally reinforced door of layered planks that has been boarded up with more wood to prevent it from opening.  It's still susceptible to fire.

prying.message: You pry the boards from the door.

name: boarded up damaged reinforced door
description: A battered and torn reinforced door with planks bursting from the joints.  The boarded up planks are fragmented and in pieces, this doesn't look like an easy repair.

prying.message: You pry the boards from the door.

name: boarded up damaged door with peephole
description: A wrecked door made of ordinary wood, except this one has a peephole and some partly-splintered boards nailed across it.  The peephole is damaged and can't be used to see through.

prying.message: You pry the boards from the door.

name: closed metal door
description: An extremely resilient door made of assorted steel, carved and pounded into shape.

name: closed corrugated metal door
description: A thin door made of corrugated steel held in a frame.

name: metal wall
description: An industrially fabricated thick sheet carefully positioned and joined seamlessly with perimeter sealant, this wall is capable of resisting extreme elements as well as hostile forces.  Blast load rated and extremely fire-retardant, breaching it will require specialized tools or an industrial vehicle.

name: open secret door
description: This apparently normal segment of metal wall has opened to reveal a secret passage.

name: concrete wall
description: A faux concrete wall positioned and joined seamlessly with the wall, this wall is capable of resisting extreme elements as well as hostile forces.  Blast load rated and extremely fire-retardant, breaching it will require specialized tools or an industrial vehicle.

name: open secret door
description: This apparently normal segment of concrete wall has opened to reveal a secret passage.

name: closed metal door
description: An extremely resilient door made of assorted steel, carved and pounded into shape.

name: electronic locked metal door
description: An extremely resilient door made of assorted steel, carved and pounded into shape.  It is locked by an electronic keypad.

name: open metal door
description: An extremely resilient door made of assorted steel, carved and pounded into shape.  It's open, so no tools are needed to break in.

name: open corrugated metal door
description: A thin door made of corrugated steel held in a frame.  It's open, so no tools are needed to break in.

name: open metal door
description: An extremely resilient door made of assorted steel, carved and pounded into shape.  It's open, so no tools are needed to break in.

name: closed metal door with peephole
description: An extremely resilient door made of assorted steel, carved and pounded into shape.  If you examined it more closely, you'd be able to peek through the peephole.

name: open metal door with peephole

name: closed metal door
description: A galvanized steel door, forged to withstand punishment and impede anyone or anything.  Typically used in conjunction with automated electronic locking mechanisms that require an external source to unlock.
